To discard: Destroy a card in hand that costs 2$ or more.
Effect: Unleash. Any player discards three cards in hand and then draws one card.
Flavour: "Every breath is torment." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Unleash. Any player discards three cards in hand and then draws one card.
Flavour: "Best to kill these first." - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

Effect: The player with the most prepped spells suffers 2 damage for each of their prepped spells.
Flavour: "There are no words to describe the sound of a breach opening. Only the screams echoing off the cave walls after." - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

Effect: Unleash twice.
Flavour: "We toy with forces we barely comprehend." - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

Effect: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life. Then, this minion suffers 1 damage.
Flavour: The fumes they belch are so caustic that they rarely live long themselves.

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and draws a card.
Flavour: "It takes years to train a breach mage properly, but only a second to snuff one out." - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
Flavour: "We have nothing left to lose but our lives." - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: Nym looked up in awe as Malastar pointed to the roiling air at the dome of the cave. "Those, boy, are stars."

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and may place a card in their discard pile into their hand.
Flavour: "Such wisdom comes at a considerable price." - Xaxos, Voidbringer

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
Flavour: "Kadir remains convinced the drones were once merely creatures from The Depths."

Effect: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card was revealed, that player suffers 2 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
Unleash twice.#OR#Any player suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: "Beyond our world is a vast nothing. At the center of this lies The Nameless." - Mist, Voidwalker

Effect: Any player suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "The sound they make as they weave echoes through the cave is like the otherworldly throes of our lost companions." - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

Effect: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.
Flavour: "Here beneath The World That Was there is no day, no time really, just night unending." - Xaxos, Voidbringer

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.
Flavour: "It's as if the world itself is screaming." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Unleash twice.
Flavour: "None remembered the true name of The World That Was until Yan Magda spoke it aloud: Khasad Vol."

Effect: Unleash. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.
Flavour: "The creature thrashed as it burned, its massive body collapsing into the South Wall like a hot blade through cloth." - Garu, Oathsworn Keeper

Effect: Any player discards a prepped spell.#OR#Any player loses 1 charge.
Flavour: "It is the very breath of the void." - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 2 damage and gains a charge.
Unleash. Any player suffers 2 damage. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.
Any player suffers 2 damage and discards a card in hand. If that card costs 0$, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash. Any player discards two gems. If both of those gems cost 0$, Unleash.
Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage.
Gravehold suffers 3 damage. The player with the fewest opened breaches suffers 2 damage.
Place this card next to the player with the most life. For the rest of the game, when that player suffers damage, they suffer 1 additional damage.#(This cannot be removed once resolved.)
If there are two or more other minions in play, Gravehold suffers 6 damage and discard this minion. Otherwise, any player suffers 2 damage.
Any player suffers 1 damage. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.

Immediate: This minion suffers damage equal to the numbers of players in the game.
Effect: Unleash.
Unleash. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards a card in hand. If that card is a gem, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
Unleash. Any player discards two gems in hand.
Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage. Any player discards a card in hand.
Unleash. The player with the most prepped spells suffers 1 damage and discards a prepped spell.
Unleash twice and any player gains 2 charges.#OR#Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: "The days seem shorter as we approach a war eternal." - Nerva, Survivor

To discard: Discard a card in hand that costs 5$ or more.
Effect: Unleash. Any player discards a spell in hand and suffers 2 damage.
Any player suffers 1 damage. If the nemesis tier is 2 or higher, that player suffers 2 additional damage.

Special: Reduce to 1 all damage dealt to this minion by spells that cost 5$ or more.
Effect: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Place this in front of the player with the most opened breaches.#At the start of that player's turn, they suffer 1 damage. When that player gains a card that costs 5$ or more, this card is discarded. If there are no cards in the supply that cost 5$ or more, discard this when they gain a card with the highest cost in the supply.
Unleash.

Special: When a power token is removed from this, any player suffers 2 damage.
Effect: Unleash.
Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Any player gains a Cursed Shard from the Curse deck. Any player gains a Cursed Bolt from the Curse deck.
Flavour: "Just standing there exhausted me. I didn't stick around to find out what else could happen." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player gains a Cursed Bolt from the Curse deck.
Flavour: "It's not just the wind. The stuff it's blowing, that's not sand and stone." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 2 damage, gains a Cursed Shard from the Curse deck, and places it on top of their deck.
Any player suffers 3 damage and gains a Curse of Rot from the Curse deck.
The players collectively discard four cards.
Flavour: "Fear is a luxury no longer granted to the living." - Brama, Breach Mage Mentor

Effect: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. If the nemesis tier is 2 or higher, Gravehold suffers 2 additional damage.#(The nemesis tier is equal to the tier of the last nemesis card drawn.)

To discard: Discard a card in hand that costs 5$ or more.
Effect: Unleash twice. Any player discards a spell in hand.
